com.soa.message

Class MessageSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.message.MessageSerializer

  • public class MessageSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Serializes message content using different outputs.

    • Method Detail

      • setTransformers

        public void setTransformers(com.digev.fw.xml.util.TransformerPool transformers)
        Configures a TransformerPool for the MessageSerializer to use. If not configured a pool won't be used but a transformer will be created on the fly which will add some overhead.
        Parameters:
        transformers - TransformerPool to use for serializing.

      • serialize

        public void serialize(Message msg,
                      java.io.Writer writer)
               throws GException
        Serializes a message to a writer. If the original message was using an InputStream or Reader for it's content the stream or reader will not be exhausted. This may require changing the original message to use buffering.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to serialize.
        writer - Writer to serialize to.
        Throws:
        GException

      • serialize

        public void serialize(Message msg,
                      java.io.OutputStream stream)
               throws GException
        Serializes a message to an output stream. If the original message was using an InputStream or Reader for it's content the stream or reader will not be exhausted. This may require changing the original message to use buffering.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to serialize.
        stream - OutputStream to serialize to.
        Throws:
        GException

      • serialize

        public void serialize(Message msg,
                      javax.xml.transform.Result result)
               throws GException
        Serializes a message to Result. If the original message was using an InputStream or Reader for it's content the stream or reader will not be exhausted. This may require changing the original message to use buffering.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to serialize.
        result - Result to serialize to.
        Throws:
        GException
